Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\gii\generators\module\Generator

All Classes | Properties | Methods | Events | Constants
Inheritanceyii\gii\generators\module\Generator » yii\gii\Generator » yii\base\Model » yii\base\Component » yii\base\Object
ImplementsArrayAccess, IteratorAggregate, yii\base\Arrayable
Available since version2.0
Source Code
This generator will generate the skeleton code needed by a module.

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By

$validators property read-only

all the validators declared in the model.

$activeValidators property read-only
yii\validators\Validator[] getActiveValidators( $attribute = null )

the validators applicable to the current $scenario.

$errors property read-only
array getErrors( $attribute = null )

errors for all attributes or the specified attribute. Empty array is returned if no error. Note that when returning errors for all attributes, the result is a two-dimensional array, like the following:

[
    'username' => [
        'Username is required.',
        'Username must contain only word characters.',
    ],
    'email' => [
        'Email address is invalid.',
    ]
]

$firstErrors property read-only
array getFirstErrors( )

the first errors. An empty array will be returned if there is no error.

$attributes property
array getAttributes( $names = null, $except = [] )
void setAttributes( $values, $safeOnly = true )

attribute values (name => value).

$scenario property
string getScenario( )
void setScenario( $value )

the scenario that this model is in. Defaults to DEFAULT_SCENARIO.
